message_thread.content:
1. Based on the provided data, generate your justifications, ensure that ALL the A and K factors are addressed.
    2. Ensure your responses are structured in JSON format.
    3. Return a full JSON object with all your answers according to the schema.

{
    "KA_Analysis": {
        "K1": "The candidate will respond to a series of short answer questions related to AI-generated script ideation techniques for world-building, storyline, and character development in a Written Exam.",
        "A1": "The candidate will perform a practical exercise on analyzing AI output for bias and submit corrective steps in a Practical Exam.",
        "K2": "The candidate will answer questions on copyright law covering Gen AI usage in a Written Exam.",
        "A2": "The candidate will utilize NLP techniques and tools to enhance AI-generated story elements in a Practical Exam.",
        "K3": "The candidate will explain Gen AI tool limitations and solutions in a Written Exam.",
        "A3": "The candidate will apply ethical considerations in prompt selection and reference usage in a Practical Exam.",
        "K4": "The candidate will demonstrate awareness and correction of bias in LLMs training data in a Written Exam.",
        "A4": "The candidate will filter and script-edit Gen-AI output in a Practical Exam.",
        "K5": "The candidate will discuss best practices to minimize plagiarism risk in a Written Exam.",
        "A5": "The candidate will use AI-generated text techniques to develop script elements in a Practical Exam.",
        "K6": "The candidate will describe AI tools for script analysis and market research in a Written Exam.",
        "A6": "The candidate will apply and adjust prompts in the generative process to improve iterations in a Practical Exam.",
        "K7": "The candidate will discuss Gen AI and Ethics awareness in a Written Exam.",
        "A7": "The candidate will identify key terms and themes for input into Gen AI platform in a Practical Exam.",
        "K8": "The candidate will explain basic NLP techniques and tools relevant to AI Text generation in a Written Exam.",
        "A8": "The candidate will incorporate unique creative principles into AI-generated story ideas in a Practical Exam.",
        "K9": "The candidate will describe creative principles and storytelling in AI-generated text prompts in a Written Exam.",
        "A9": "The candidate will identify copyright risk in Gen-AI production and avoid infringement in a Practical Exam.",
        "K10": "The candidate will explain basic AI algorithms and models used in script/text generation in a Written Exam."
    }
}
